content.rendered:
Telehealth

Drive better health outcomes through virtual care

Build your own virtual 1-to-1 video chat or 1-to-many telehealth solution to enable patient care and real-time collaboration between clinicians and staff.

START BUILDING FOR FREE
Contact sales

Trusted by our customers

Developer, doctor, and patient friendly

Purpose-built to be simple, the Dolby.io APIs enable you to deploy virtual-first healthcare solutions with speed and ease — and at scale. Now you can build a bespoke telehealth solution to expand patient access to essential care.

With Dolby.io’s suite of Communications APIs, you can choose from a comprehensive set of features, including virtual audio or video calls powered by Dolby Voice®, audio/video recording capabilities, messaging, screen sharing, and so much more — with just a few lines of code. Whether you’re looking to build a 1-to-1 virtual meeting solution or a 1-to-many conferencing experience, we have the APIs for you.

Get up and running in no time

Take advantage of the Communications UXKit to help you go from prototype to production — effortlessly. The UXKit is a reference implementation for the essential components of a video chat session. Easily edit the source code to customize your preferred look and feel.

Our Customers

DocSpera integrates Dolby.io with surgeon telehealth solution in 1 week

“We need solutions like Dolby.io to help us move to the next level… the telehealth solution allows us to become more virtual and support surgeons from any location, so they’re able to provide the best services possible for their patients.”
Read More

MediGuru develops telehealth platform for 400+ providers with Dolby.io

“Dolby.io’s features, the roadmap that Dolby provides, and the ease of integration enabled us to customize the solution for our constituents—all without sacrificing quality and at a cost that is beneficial.”
Read More

Dolby.io supports InputHealth’s (Telus Health) 600% increase in usage during COVID-19

“Dolby.io stood out, really, from the perspective of giving us the power and the flexibility and the customizability that we needed to embed something intricately into our software suite and really give us that control that we needed.”
Read More

Physitrack enhances the quality of its industry-leading telehealth solution with Dolby.io

“Dolby.io’s superior call quality with HD video and sound, as well as a robust and scalable solution had the flexibility we were looking for.”
Read More

Popular use cases

1:1 patient calls

Continuing education and training

Session recording and distribution

Healthcare event streaming

Real-time first aid

Patient chat

On the technical side, we were excited about Dolby.io’s superior call quality with HD video and sound.

Henrick Molin

CEO and Co-Founder of Physitrack

I can tell you as a practicing physician who sees patients through our own technology, which embeds Dolby.io, that high-quality audio in the context of video-based visits is instrumental to having productive conversations with patients and providing the care that they need.

Damon Ramsey

CEO & Co-Founder of InputHealth

Dolby.io has been a fantastic solution for us, both in terms of security and reliability.

Luca Santarella

Head of Research & Development at DocSpera

Dolby.io gave us a very fast time to market. We started user testing within 5-8 weeks.

Arul Venkatachalam

CEO of MediGuru

SECURITY

Secure, reliable, and scalable

We remove the complexity of building a communications solution while ensuring security and compliance, including access to a global infrastructure. Dolby.io is GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant.

The Dolby difference

Dolby has revolutionized the science of sight and sound through innovative research and engineering. Right out-of-the box, your users can experience Dolby-quality sound in your apps through the power of Dolby Voice®. Dolby Voice® is an award-winning audio communications technology backed by decades of expertise in sound signal processing.

Reliable and scalable

Our network resilience and random loss distribution capabilities help to maintain audio quality between users even in the most challenging network conditions. Our mixing solution processes over 15 billion minutes annually with conference providers such as BlueJeans and British Telecom.

Secure and compliant

From encryption and security certification to our commitment to a secure environment, Dolby.io delivers a communication service that you can trust. Dolby.io is GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant.

Resources

Explore additional content

Introducing the Dolby.io Media Transcode API

The Transcode API provides another powerful tool from Dolby.io to help you understand, improve, and distribute media …

Jayson DeLancey

Developer Relations

Developer

Create Audio Podcasts from Video By Using a Transcode API in Post-Production

Learn to produce audio-only mp3s from recorded mp4 videos as a podcasting tool use case.

Jayson DeLancey

Developer Relations

Developer

Dolby.io Streaming API with Millicast at SXSW 2022

Dolby.io showed off our new Streaming API at South by Southwest 2022 using our acquisition of Millicast. …

Griffin Solot-Kehl

Developer Advocate

Communications

Using Kotlin to Create Your First Audio Voice Call on Android with Dolby.io

Learn how to use Kotlin to build an Android application that supports Voice Calls.

Denize Ignacio

Developer Relations

Developer

Using Music Mastering on “Take Me Out to the Ball Game”

In this guide we explore how to algorithmically remaster the 1908 baseball anthem “Take Me Out to …

Braden Riggs

Developer Advocate

Get started

Go beyond brick and mortar with virtual care

No credit card to start. Get a $15 credit just for signing up.

Start building for free Start building for free
Contact sales

Keep a good thing going

Get the latest news, events, and product updates from the Dolby.io team.
